long_description: With reliable waterproof protection and grippy traction soles, the Merrell Grassbow Sport waterproof shoes equip you for treks through the woods in any weather. Breathable air mesh and synthetic uppers are treated with a Durable Waterproof Repellent coating to help shed moisture and resist staining. Waterproof breathable membrane keeps water out, while allowing feet to breathe so you don't overheat; bellowed tongues keep debris out. Molded thermoplastic urethane heel counters provide good support. Merrell air cushions in the heels absorb shock and add stability. M-Select FRESH natural enzymes prevent odors from developing. Grippy outsoles with 3.5mm-deep lugs provide dependable traction on slick trails. Merrell Grassbow Sport waterproof shoes include removable EVA footbeds. All-synthetic construction makes these vegan-friendly.
short_description: With reliable waterproof protection and grippy traction soles, the Merrell Grassbow Sport waterproof shoes equip you for treks through the woods in any weather.
